title: LoggingService.LogComment causes large amounts of contention between unrelated evaluation threads.
body:
### Issue Description
LoggingService.LogComment causes large amounts of contention between unrelated evaluation threads.
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/25249058/152361351-ff5d51a9-5630-4aaf-8178-4597d5bf9773.png)

### Steps to Reproduce
- clean solution VS temp files (.vs)
- clean solution (msbuild /t:clean)
- track in perfview: open solution with large number of projects

### Versions & Configurations
VS 17.2
